title: PURCHASE TEAM SKINS DURING GAMES LIKE ALL FOR ONE & ULTRA RAPID FIRE WITH IP NOT JUST RP!
body:
Wouldn't you like to be able to purchase team skins during game modes like All for One, Ultra Rapid Fire, etc...with IP, not just RP.

VOTE BELOW, for the ability to purchase team skins with (IP) as well as (RP).
If we get enough votes Riot WILL take notice!

I think around 1500-2000 IP is a fair price to pay in (IP) to purchase skins for your team in event game modes. Let Riot know you agree! You can also comment with the amount you would be willing to pay (in IP) for team skins. I appreciate any support,
Thanks,
{{champion:77}}  GNIKRAW

replies.body: I'd say if they did make it purchasable with IP, it would have to cost a lot because they still are skins being used.  It would be nice for those people who have nothing to spend IP on anymore though.
Well...Riot deleted my last post bc it was in the wrong section. (**SO DUMB**, this pissed me off severely.) So let's start this over please!
